attributes.name: initialOpacity
attributes.description: The initial opacity set on the wave.

attributes.name: opacityDecayVelocity
attributes.description: How fast (opacity per second) the wave fades out.

attributes.name: recenters
attributes.description:
If true, ripples will exhibit a gravitational pull towards
the center of their container as they fade away.

attributes.name: center
attributes.description: If true, ripples will center inside its container

attributes.name: noink
attributes.description:
If true, the ripple will not generate a ripple effect
via pointer interaction.
Calling ripple's imperative api like `simulatedRipple` will
still generate the ripple effect.

If true, the ripple will not generate a ripple effect
via pointer interaction.
Calling ripple's imperative api like `simulatedRipple` will
